Package etithespirit.orimod.common.tile.light

Class AbstractLightEnergyHub

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.CapabilityProvider<net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>
net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity
etithespirit.orimod.common.tile.light.AbstractLightEnergyHub
All Implemented Interfaces:
INetworkNBTProvider, IWorldUpdateListener, ILightEnergyStorage, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProviderImpl<net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilitySerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag>, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlockEntity, net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TileEntityLightCapacitor, TileEntityLightEnergyDebugger
public abstract class AbstractLightEnergyHub extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity implements IWorldUpdateListener, ILightEnergyStorage, INetworkNBTProvider
A superclass representing all Light-based energy blocks that manage energy in some way, such as adding it, removing it, or both.
Hubs are a core component of assemblies which manage and optimize networks of Light equipment.

    • neighborAddedOrRemoved

      public void neighborAddedOrRemoved(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos at, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos changedAt, net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity replacedTile, boolean isMoving)
      Description copied from interface: IWorldUpdateListener
      Occurs when a IWorldUpdateListener adjacent to this BlockEntity is added, replaced, or removed.
      Specified by:
      neighborAddedOrRemoved in interface IWorldUpdateListener
      Parameters:
      state - The state of this block.
      world - The world this change occurred in.
      at - Where in the world this change occurred.
      changedAt - Where the change occurred.
      replacedTile - The previous TileEntity at the block. It will be missing core data, so reference the world and changedAt parameters to get the world and location.
      isMoving - Whether or not this change occurred due to a piston push.

    • acceptsConversion

      public boolean acceptsConversion()
      Description copied from interface: ILightEnergyStorage
      Whether or not this storage is a valid candidate for use in the Light Energy Adapter (for conversion to RF).
      Specified by:
      acceptsConversion in interface ILightEnergyStorage
